div.p: The principal primary source of the data which can be found here is Dillmann, C. F. A. 1865. Lexicon linguae aethiopicae, Cum indice latino. Adiectum est vocabularium tigre dialecti septentrionalis compilatum a W. Munziger (Lipsiae: T. O. Weigel, 1865). This project was started and carried on by Alessandro Bausi, Andreas Ellwardt and many others. For more details see A. Bausi, ‘Introduction. 150 Years After Dillmann’s Lexicon’, in A. Bausi and E. Sokolinski, eds, 150 Years after Dillmann’s Lexicon: Perspectives and Challenges of Gǝʿǝz Studies, Supplement to Aethiopica, 5 (Wiesbaden: Harrassowitz Verlag, 2016), 3-10.
